resources.string: Too many requests. Try again later

This application needs your location information.
Give location permission so that the restaurants around you can be listed.

The restaurants in your area cannot be listed because the location information has not been shared.
Allow location permission for this application from permission settings.
Activate the location in your device settings to get the most recent restaurants in your location
